alert.note: Alert for Daviess; Henderson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 01 at 8:54PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM CDT OR 4 AM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Indiana and northwest Kentucky, including the following counties, in southwest Indiana, Gibson, Pike, Spencer, Vanderburgh, and Warrick. In western Kentucky, Daviess and Henderson. * WHEN...Until 3 AM CDT, or 4 AM EDT, Sunday. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Heavy rains have saturated the ground in the Watch area. Additional heavy rains later tonight falling upon this area may result in flash flooding.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
